item.title: Taking requests, as long as they dont have to walk far
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

zadragnmastr:

can u make an auto chicken killer and feather picker upper that works please?

Done! :D:
[scar]program m0u53m4tsfeatherman;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////m0u53m4ts Feather Man V1\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////(With antiDeath!)\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////////////Setup\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////1. Set to low detail\\\\\\\\\\\\\
/////////////////////////2. Set screen to 32 bit\\\\\\\\\\\\
////3. Drag crosshairs over runescape every time you start the script\
///////////////////////4. Start in chicken coop.\\\\\\\\\\\\
///////////////////////////5. Setup line 33\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////6. Donate via paypal to junk4owen@hotmail.com\\\\\\
////////////7. Enjoy the awesomeness of my first ever script\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////////////Note\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//////////////////////////////Made for SRL 3.\\\\\\\\\\\\\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\
//!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!\
//!!NEW!!///If it dies it will walk back to the chicken pen!\!!NEW!!\
//!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!!!NEW!\
////////////////////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

Var
xv,yv,x1,y1,picked,picktries,
logoutwhen,Numberoffeathers,
rightclickfeathers,fountaindtm,
bouldersdtm,nodies : Integer;

procedure setup;
begin
NumberOfFeathers:= 2000
end;

const StartPlayer = 0; // Determines who will play first

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=2; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer:=StartPlayer; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

 Players[0].Name :='';
 Players[0].Pass :='';
 Players[0].Nick :='';
 Players[0].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[0].Skill:='';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

 Players[1].Name :='h1tchh1k3r5';
 Players[1].Pass :='mynewaccountrules';
 Players[1].Nick :='h1tchh1k3r5';
 Players[1].Loc  :='Loc1';
 Players[1].Skill:='Mining';
 Players[1].Active:=True;

 writeln('You have currently ' +inttostr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players set to run.');

end;

procedure antidie;
begin
fountaindtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63AC676260286340014EE5FF194480342’ +
‘310FF0702C63A4C35D71FBE82AB0101C6064C3582412F51D40000’ +
‘2B760CCA’);
bouldersdtm:= DTMFromString(‘78DA63DCCCC4C07088010524662532F000694’ +
‘620FE0F048C9B30D5B80778C1D58000007B2C0913’);
if weareinmm(fountaindtm) then
begin
nodies := nodies +1
makecompass(‘N’)
mouse(717,60,2,2,true)
wait(3000)
humanflag(10)
mouse(240,94,2,2,true)
flag
wait(1000)
repeat
begin
GetSymbolColor(xv,yv,‘transportation’)
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
wait(20000)
flag
end
until(findsymbol(x1,y1,‘fishing spot’))
repeat
begin
GetSymbolColor(xv,yv,‘transportation’)
mouse(xv,yv-22,3,3,true)
wait(3000)
flag
end
until(weareinmm(bouldersdtm))
finddtm(bouldersdtm,xv,yv,630,11,682,36)
mouse(xv+3,yv,2,2,true)
wait(3000)
flag
findcolortolerance(xv,yv,7236982,617,4,701,35,15)
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
wait(6000)
flag
if findcolortolerance(xv,yv,7236982,588,5,687,43,15) = false then
begin
writeln(‘Lost on the way back from the dead’)
logout
end
findcolortolerance(xv,yv,7236982,588,5,687,43,15)
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
wait(7000)
flag
FindSymbol(xv,yv,‘churn’)
mouse(xv+20,yv-15,2,2,true)
humanflag(30)
if FindSymbol(xv,yv,‘churn’) = false then
begin
writeln(‘Lost on the way back from the dead’)
logout
end
end
freedtm(fountaindtm)
freedtm(bouldersdtm)
end;

procedure findmyrandoms;
begin
if random(15) = 5 then pickupmouse
if random(15) = 5 then antiban
if random(50) = 5 then hoverskill(‘prayer’,false)
findnormalrandoms
antidie
end;

procedure openbag;
begin
mouse(632,174,8,8,true)
end;

procedure findfeathers;
begin

   rightclickfeathers := BitmapFromString(20, 6, 'z78DA3375313531317773B3343031C' +
   '0244DC1B29824F1EA71A9442691012ED368A11E0270A927DE17C4' +
   '98437C0850D7FDB8CCC1B4915473280F3752530B31E60300CEC19' +
   'AED');

repeat
begin

repeat
begin
findmyrandoms
picktries := attempts + 1
if picktries > 30 then
logout
wait(200+random(200))
if(random(2)=1) then
begin
findmyrandoms
end;
end;
until(FindColorTolerance(xv,yv, 13224400, 10, 30, 516, 337, 5)=true)

findmyrandoms
mmouse(xv,yv,0,0)
wait(random(50+random(50)))
if(option2(‘eathe’) or option2(‘one’) or option2(‘Raw’)) THEN
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x1,y1, 3769056, 40, 7, 80, 25, 20)) then
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,false)
findmyrandoms
if(findbitmaptolerancein(rightclickfeathers,xv,yv,8,22,514,336,20)=true) then
begin
wait(200+random(10))
mouse(xv,yv,2,2,true)
wait(100+random(50))
findmyrandoms
picked := 1
wait(3000 + random(500))
end;
end;
findmyrandoms
wait(random(100))
if random(3) >1 then
SendArrowSilentWait(1, 50 + random(500));
if(random(2)=1) then findmyrandoms
end;
until(picked = 1)
picktries := 0
attempts := 0
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;

begin
writeln(’ ‘);
WriteLn(’<==================Progress Report=====================>’);
writeln('Worked for : '+ TimeRunning);
writeln('Number of feathers picked : '+inttostr(logoutwhen*5));
writeln('Number of deaths : '+inttostr(nodies));
writeln(‘Current Player : ‘+ Players[CurrentPlayer].Name)
writeln(’<======================================================>’);
SRLRandomsReport;
end;

begin
ActivateClient
SetupSRL;
declareplayers
HighestAngle
setrun(true)
openbag
fixchat
findmyrandoms
repeat
findfeathers
antiban
findmyrandoms
if random(40) = 1 then
begin
setrun(true)
openbag
end;
if random(100) = 1 then progressreport
until(loggedin=false)
writeln(‘Completed Script’)
end.[/scar]

Is Catherby in non-members? Im not a member.
